userId,

nickName,
password,

mapper.update:
update userinfo
phoneNum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registerDate = #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userinfo set phoneNum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registerDate = #{registerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
